entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
